item.title: Luna, stablecoin and WAGMI
item.author: Author
item.description: For those who aren’t familiar with blockchain (which, lucky you…), there’s a cryptocurrency called Luna/UST that crashes. Not just any random coin btw, it’s on the top 5/10 of cryptocurrencies. It’s actually used as a stablecoin (algorithmic stablecoin, to be exact…) which is just a fancy term for an alternative to a dollar. It tries to artificially cap the price to be exactly 1 dollar, and if you think suppressing something’s price is a bad idea, well you’re correct.
